abstract: Agile Software had already seen two of its largest rivals snatched up before Oracle acquired it for $495 million. The Agile deal brings Oracle head-to-head with SAP in the manufacturing-related ERP software arena, The 451 Group wrote in a report. Back in August, when Agile’s stock was in the low $5 range, The 451 Group said that it expected the company to be acquired. Earlier this month, Oracle agreed to pay $8.10 a share for Agile.
